item.title: 191. Number of 1 Bits
item.description: https://leetcode.com/problems/number-of-1-bits/ Problem Statement: Return the number of bits set to 1 in a 4 byte integer. Idea: The idea here is to use a clever trick, created by Brian Kernighan. Instead of doing a naive O(N) traversal over the bits of the input integer, this algorthim works by removing the rightmost 1 bit iteratively until the number is zero. Therefore, the number of iterations the algorithm takes to converge depends on the number of bits set to 1 on the input integer.
